context.description: Create processed material item for chromium metal. Papers indicate 2-10 mg/g in lunar regolith, enriched in olivine. Critical for ruby laser synthesis (Cr-doped Al2O3), steel alloys, and chromite ore processing. Papers: ceramics-08-00107.txt and FFC-process-for-deep-ISRU.txt discuss Cr concentrations.

Create thermoelectric material item for magnesium silicide (Mg2Si). Papers indicate production from ball-milled Mg + Si powder. Thermoelectric ceramic for power generation applications. Papers: ceramics-08-00107.txt discusses Mg2Si thermoelectric.

Create alloy material item for Inovco (62.5% Fe, 33% Ni, 4.5% Co). Papers indicate even lower thermal expansion than Invar. Ultra-low coefficient of thermal expansion for precision applications. Papers: Lunar-Demandite.txt discusses Inovco.

context.production: steam reforming CH4+H2O at 850°C, Ni catalyst, 4 MPa
context.description: Create chemical feedstock item for syngas (CO + H2 mixture). Papers indicate production from CH4 + H2O → CO + 3H2 at 850°C with Ni catalyst at 4 MPa (steam reforming). Critical chemical feedstock for entire organic chemistry branch: methanol synthesis, Fischer-Tropsch, etc. Papers: Multiple papers discuss syngas production and uses.

Create raw material item for troilite (FeS). Papers indicate ~1% of mare basalt, ubiquitous in meteorites. Critical sulfur source for lunar ISRU (80-95% extraction at 1100-1300°C). Also found in NiFe meteorites. Papers: Multiple papers mention troilite as primary sulfur source.

Create magnet material item for cobalt ferrite (CoFe2O4). Papers indicate hard ferrite permanent magnet material from Fe2O3 compounds. Also soft ferrites like NiFe2O4. Important for motors and magnetic applications. Papers: Multiple papers discuss ferrite magnets.

Research and implement complete sapphire (Al2O3 single crystal) production chain. Papers indicate: (1) Czochralski process at high temperature, (2) Hydrothermal synthesis option, (3) Verneuil flame process, (4) Applications: laser host material, optical components. Need to create: process (Czochralski growth), sapphire crystal product, recipes. Search design/papers/ for synthesis methods and process parameters. Papers: I-SAIRAS-2020-Sustainable-Lunar-Exploration.txt and ISRU-Sensors.txt discuss sapphire synthesis.

Research and implement complete ruby (Cr-doped Al2O3) laser crystal production chain. Papers indicate: (1) Synthesis from Al2O3 + Cr2O3 at 2000°C via hydrogen-oxygen torch, (2) Seeded growth in Na2CO3 at 445°C/380 MPa, (3) Laser output: 1 kW at 694.3 nm. Need to create: Cr-doping process, ruby crystal growth, recipes. Search design/papers/ for detailed synthesis. Papers: ISRU-Sensors.txt discusses ruby laser synthesis.

Create ceramic material item for silicon oxycarbide (SiOC). Papers indicate piezoresistive properties with sensitivity ~145, produced from polysiloxane pyrolysis at ≥1400°C. Important for pressure/strain sensors. Papers: ceramics-08-00107.txt and ISRU-Sensors.txt discuss SiOC piezoresistive ceramics.

Create carbonate item for calcium carbonate (CaCO3). Papers indicate role as intermediate in Solvay process and other chemical reactions. Calcination to CaO (limestone). Important for CO2 sequestration and cement chemistry. Papers: I-SAIRAS-2020 and Lunar-Demandite discuss CaCO3.

Create lubricant material item for talc (Mg3Si4O10(OH)2). Papers indicate use as dry lubricant. Can be synthesized from magnesium and silicon compounds. Papers: ceramics-08-00107.txt mentions talc as dry lubricant.

Create alloy material item for silumin (Al-Si alloy). Papers indicate 3-25% Si content, with 87% Al + 13% Si as typical composition. High durability, used for pistons and moving parts. Al-Si alloys 20-50% Si used for welds and brazing. Papers: ellery-et-al-2022-metalysis mentions Al-Si alloys and silumin applications.

Create magnet material item for barium ferrite (BaFe12O19). Papers indicate hard ferrite permanent magnet material. Important for motors and magnetic devices. Papers: Lunar-Demandite.txt mentions BaFe12O19.

Create mineral material item for enstatite (MgSiO3). Papers indicate orthopyroxene formed from olivine + quartz reaction. Magnesium silicate. Can be hydrated to serpentinite. Papers: ceramics-08-00107.txt discusses enstatite.

Create processed material item for calcium metal. Papers indicate extraction from CaO reduction, has twice the electrical conductivity of copper. From anorthite processing. Can be used as high-conductivity conductor alternative. Papers: Lunar-Demandite.txt discusses calcium extraction and conductivity.

Create clay material item for bentonite (from montmorillonite). Papers indicate use as binder in sand casting. Important for mold-making in metal casting operations. Papers: ceramics-08-00107.txt mentions bentonite binder.

Create clay mineral item for illite (mica-type clay). Papers indicate intermediate in kaolinite formation from orthoclase via HCl weathering. Mica-type structure. Papers: ceramics-08-00107.txt and Lunar-Demandite discuss illite as intermediate.

Create processed material item for pure magnesium metal. Papers indicate production from MgO reduction above 650°C, tappable as molten metal. From olivine (Mg2SiO4) aluminothermic reduction at 1000°C. Critical for lightweight alloys (magnalium). Papers: Multiple papers discuss Mg extraction from olivine.

Create gas item for carbon monoxide (CO). Papers indicate production from carbothermal reduction at high temperatures, Boudouard reaction (2CO → C + CO2 at 700°C), and as component of syngas. Important intermediate for chemical synthesis and metal reduction. Papers: Multiple papers discuss CO production and recycling.

Create alloy material item for Invar (64% Fe, 36% Ni). Papers indicate minimal thermal expansion, critical for precision instruments and structures requiring dimensional stability. Low coefficient of thermal expansion. Papers: Lunar-Demandite.txt discusses Invar properties.

Create clay material item for montmorillonite. Papers indicate production from pyroxene weathering via HCl treatment. Swelling clay mineral. Intermediate or alternative to kaolinite from different mineral source. Papers: ceramics-08-00107.txt discusses montmorillonite from pyroxene.

Create alloy material item for titanium aluminide (TiAl). Papers indicate excellent high-temperature properties for aerospace applications. Important for high-temperature structural components on lunar surface. Papers: ellery-et-al-2022-metalysis mentions TiAl properties.

Create acid item for sulfuric acid (H2SO4). Papers indicate production from SO2 + H2O via Ostwald/contact process. Industrial workhorse acid for chemical processing. SO2 from sulfur/troilite oxidation. Papers: I-SAIRAS-2020 and Lunar-Demandite discuss H2SO4 production.

Create intermediate compound item for gibbsite (Al(OH)3). Papers indicate intermediate in magnesia synthesis and aluminum processing. Aluminum hydroxide precipitate. Papers: ceramics-08-00107.txt mentions gibbsite as intermediate.

Create alloy material item for supermalloy (79% Ni, 16% Fe, 5% Mo). Papers indicate very high magnetic permeability, highest of soft magnetic materials. Critical for electromagnets and magnetic applications. Papers: Lunar-Demandite.txt discusses supermalloy properties.

Create cement material item for geopolymer cement (alkali-activated aluminosilicate). Papers indicate activation with sodium silicate (waterglass) or other alkali solutions. Alternative to Portland cement for lunar construction. Made from metakaolin or other aluminosilicates. Papers: ceramics-08-00107.txt and ellery-2021-leveraging discuss geopolymers.

Create chemical compound item for sodium chloride (NaCl). Papers indicate source from lunar volatiles via salt chemistry. Critical feedstock for Solvay process (NaCl + CaCO3 → Na2CO3 + CaCl2), sodium hydroxide production via electrolysis. Papers: Multiple papers discuss NaCl from volatiles and Solvay process.

Create raw material item for spinel ore (MgAl2O4). Papers indicate spinel is synthesized from magnesia and alumina at 1800°C, but natural spinel may exist in lunar regolith. Properties: hardness 16 GPa, melting point 2135°C. Applications: refractory, optics (UV-IR 0.2-5.5 µm), armor. Papers: ceramics-08-00107.txt mentions MgAl2O4 spinel synthesis and properties.

Create processed clay item for metakaolin (calcined kaolinite). Papers indicate dehydroxylated kaolinite for geopolymer production. Thermal treatment of kaolinite removes hydroxyl groups. Critical for alkali-activated geopolymer cements. Papers: ceramics-08-00107.txt discusses metakaolin for geopolymers.

Create base item for sodium hydroxide (NaOH). Papers indicate production from NaCl electrolysis reactions. Important base for chemical processing and alkali activation of geopolymers. Papers: Lunar-Demandite.txt discusses NaOH from NaCl.
